title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the SmartContractAuditor tool, including the blockchain platforms to be supported, the types of vulnerabilities to be identified, and the desired output format.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the SmartContractAuditor system, including the components, data flow, and integration with blockchain platforms.

title: Develop Smart Contract Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core analysis engine that can parse and analyze smart contract code, identify potential vulnerabilities, and provide recommendations.

title: Integrate with Blockchain Platforms
description: Develop the necessary interfaces and adapters to integrate the SmartContractAuditor tool with various blockchain platforms, enabling seamless interaction and contract retrieval.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for the SmartContractAuditor tool, allowing users to submit contracts, view analysis results, and manage their projects.

title: Implement Reporting and Visualization
description: Develop reporting and visualization components to present the analysis results in a clear and understandable format, highlighting potential vulnerabilities and providing actionable recommendations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for the SmartContractAuditor project, enabling automated testing, building, and deployment to various environments.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the correctness and reliability of the SmartContractAuditor tool, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Perform Security Audits
description: Engage security specialists to conduct thorough audits of the SmartContractAuditor tool, identifying potential vulnerabilities and ensuring the highest level of security.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the SmartContractAuditor tool, including user guides, developer documentation, and API references.
